OTMql4Zmq - ZeroMQ bindings for MQL4 Python

https://github.com/OpenTrading/OTMql4Zmq/

The OTMql4Zmq project allows the OTMql4Py
to work with http://zeromq.org.
It builds on OTMql4Py, and requires it as a pre-requisite.

You also must have installed http://www.python.org, and the
https://github.com/OpenTrading/OTMql4Py/ and
https://github.com/OpenTrading/OTMql4Lib/.
OpenTrader runs fine with the C coded implmentation of ZeroMQ for Metatrader:
https://github.com/OpenTrading/OTMql4Zmq/raw/master/MQL4/Experts/OTMql4/OTZmqCmdEA.mq4

Parent: Components
